name: Snake 3D (itch) (Colonthree Enterprises)
description:
Controles
  • WASD moves the snake horizontally.
  • Q moves the snake down.
  • E moves the snake up.
  • Left & Right arrows rotate the camera.
  • R resets should you DIE.

Shouldst thou be interest'd in my other project about automagic 3D object creation, please check out Sloyd.ai
